description: Provide the Forecast model in Inventory Management.The Forecast form allow to define the expected stock movement towardscustomers in any period of time in the future. A wiard allow tocompute the expected quantities with respect to a period in thepast. Once the form confirmed, the corresponding moves are created andspread homogeneously across the period. Those moves will allow otherprocess to take forecasts into account.
longdescription: Provide the Forecast model in Inventory Management.The Forecast form allow to define the expected stock movement towardscustomers in any period of time in the future. A wiard allow tocompute the expected quantities with respect to a period in thepast. Once the form confirmed, the corresponding moves are created andspread homogeneously across the period. Those moves will allow otherprocess to take forecasts into account.
